short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clicks continue in Nitro Stream Racing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will automatically click "Collect" and "Continue" after races in the Nitro Stream Racing web client, allowing you back to the lobby page to automatically rejoin the streamer you are watching for the next race without having to click anything.
